x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • ServiceNow Customer Service Management (CSM): For managing citizen requests, communications, and case tracking.
  • ServiceNow Portal/Service Catalog: To create a user-friendly interface for citizens to submit issues and check status updates.
  • Workflow Automation: Automates assignment, escalation, and notification processes for reported issues.
  • Reporting and Analytics: Visualizes trends, hotspots, and resolution times for city administrators.
  • Integration Hub: Connects with external municipal systems or mapping services for enhanced context and automation.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with Municipal Databases: APIs or connectors to access and update city maintenance records.
  • Geolocation Services: Integration with mapping APIs (e.g., Google Maps) for location tagging of issues.
  • Authentication and Security: User verification (via Aadhaar, phone number, etc.) to ensure legitimate reporting and data protection.
  • Notification Services: SMS/email integration for status updates and escalations.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Data Privacy and Security: Protecting sensitive citizen information from unauthorized access.
  • Integration Complexity: Connecting ServiceNow with legacy municipal systems and databases may require custom development.
  • User Adoption: Encouraging citizens to use the portal and educating them about its benefits.
  • Scalability: Ensuring the solution can handle high volumes of submissions during peak times or emergencies.
  • Language and Accessibility: Supporting multiple local languages and making the portal accessible to all demographics.
  • Resource Constraints: Municipal agencies may face budget or staffing limitations to manage and resolve reported issues efficiently.
